description: Compare as many prompt responses as you need!
title: Prompt Octopus | Side-by-side prompt engineering
introduction: Prompt Octopus is a tool that allows users to compare multiple prompts side by side. It supports adding an OpenAI API key, changing model types, and the number of prompts. Users can also self-host the tool via GitHub.
features: Compare multiple prompts side by side
targetPeople: Individuals who need to compare multiple prompts, such as writers, developers, and AI enthusiasts

faqs.question: How can I add an OpenAI API key?
faqs.answer: You can add an OpenAI API key which will be stored locally in cache and can be cleared anytime in settings.

faqs.question: Can I change the model type and number of prompts?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can change the model type and number of prompts by clicking the Octopus icon.

faqs.question: Is it possible to self-host this tool?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can self-host Prompt Octopus on GitHub.
